description.original: A plugin to add better external file links to notes.
description.translation: 一个可以向笔记添加更好的外部文件链接的插件。

dict.setDesc(\"Will show file endings when ac: setDesc("激活时将显示文件结尾。"
dict.setDesc(\"Will copy the file to Obsidian: setDesc("将文件复制到 Obsidian 并将其嵌入笔记中。"
dict.setName(\"Link folder instead of file\": setName("链接文件夹而不是文件"
dict.setDesc(\"Link will open the folder wher: setDesc("链接将打开文件所在的文件夹，而不是打开文件本身。"
dict.setDesc(\"Use short links instead of lon: setDesc("使用短链接而不是长链接。"
dict.setDesc(\"Specify the characters shown b: setDesc("指定每个文件链接之前显示的字符。"
